pr_title: Reset metronome tick count when toggled on.

timeline.message: Reset metronome tick count when toggled on.

timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText:
Generally, resetting plugin state should happen when plugins shut down.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	protected void startUp()
          
          
            
            	protected void shutDown()
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
Nightfirecat
